languageKey.label: Welcome to TYPO3

This is the installation wizard for the TYPO3 Content Management System. This wizard will guide you trough the complete installation process.

Please select the language for the installation process.
Database connection
Please enter the information for connecting to your prefered database.
Select /create database
Please select an existing database from the dropdown box or enter a name in the input field to create a new database.
Create admin user
Your database is set up sucessfully. Now we have to create an admin account for logging into the backend.
Congratulation
You're basic setup is ready!

Apparently you have completed the basic setup of the TYPO3 database. Now you can choose between these options: - Go to the frontend pages - Go to the backend login - Continue to configure TYPO3 (Recommended). This will let you analyse and verify that everything in your PHP installation is alright. Also if you want to configure TYPO3 to use all the cool features, you must dig into the this!
